abstract: The nodes that branch from a node to form part of a blend tree.
overview:
## Discussion

This node combines the animations of each member of this array to a single animation that represents a *blend* of the sources. If a source is a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeSourceNode], this structure blends its animation into the output. If a source is a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeBlendNode], this structure blends the output of its sources into this structure’s output.

# sources

**Instance Property**

The nodes that branch from a node to form part of a blend tree.

## Declaration

```swift
var sources: [any BlendTreeNode]
```

## Discussion

This node combines the animations of each member of this array to a single animation that represents a *blend* of the sources. If a source is a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeSourceNode], this structure blends its animation into the output. If a source is a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeBlendNode], this structure blends the output of its sources into this structure’s output.
title: sources
